modName: West Wind Combat Series - craftable version
summary: Makes all outfits from brokefoot's excellent West Wind Combat Series craftable.
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes all outfits of brokefoot's excellent West Wind Combat Series craftable. It features both his Misfit Mage and his Assault Armor. The mage items are craftable at tanning racks and can be found in the Elven category. The assault items are craftable at forges and can be found in the Dwarven category. Crafting the assault armor does not require any smithing perks, but - in line with the original mod - tempering it won't profit from any such perks either.

The original mods are REQUIRED!

West Wind Combat Series - Misfit Mage:

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36780/?

West Wind Combat Series - Assault Armor:

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31813/?

Install one or both of the original mods first, then replace the original ESPs in your skyrim/data folder with the ones from the download.

Feel free to post questions, but do keep in mind, that I'm not the creator of the original mods and cannot provide any form of support for them!

If you like this mod, don't forget to endorse the original! ;)
author: xigan
